title: Walking Dead star Jeffrey Dean Morgan secretly marries Hilarie Burton
text:
The Walking Dead's Jeffrey Dean Morgan has wed Hilarie Burton.

The beauty announced the news on Monday morning while sharing a romantic kissing photo from the nuptials.

'I just want to put it out there that WE GOT MARRIED! For real,' the actress began. 'We’ve lived as husband and wife for a decade... For years, publications have reported that we got married in 2014 or 2015 and that I’ve been married and divorced before. All untrue.'

I do: The Walking Dead's Jeffrey Dean Morgan has wed Hilarie Burton. The beauty announced the news on Monday morning while sharing a romantic kissing photo from the nuptials

A good look for her: Burton wore a backless white gown with buttons down the back and a mermaid finish with tulle

It has been reported in the past that she secretly wed Morgan; that only made sense as she has called him her 'husband' in the past.

And it's also been claimed she was wed to Ian Prange from 2004 until 2009, which she now denies.

She began her caption by saying 'This past weekend was the best of my entire life.'

Burton added there are dozens of 'thank yous I need to make.'

Took is slowly: 'We’ve lived as husband and wife for a decade. We’ve built a family, and a farm and found our community. For years, publications have reported that we got married in 2014 or 2015 and that I’ve been married and divorced before,' she said; seen with Sophia Bush

Kiddos: The New York-based couple share son Augustus Morgan, nine, and daughter George Victoria Morgan, one

And she said 'bear with me over the next week as I gush over the amazing group of people who gave us this beautiful moment.'

Then she talked about the happy news.

'But before we do any of that, Jeff and I just want to put it out there that WE GOT MARRIED! For real.

'We’ve lived as husband and wife for a decade. We’ve built a family, and a farm and found our community. For years, publications have reported that we got married in 2014 or 2015 and that I’ve been married and divorced before.

'All untrue.

'But WE knew our truth. So it felt silly to try and correct anything.'

Sweet husband: He also said on Instagram: 'I’d say words... but there aren’t any. Mrs Morgan.... I love you. Thank you for making me the luckiest man in the world. Xojd'

The New York-based couple share son Augustus Morgan, nine, and daughter George Victoria Morgan, one.

'Here’s the God’s honest fact: From the moment I met @jeffreydeanmorgan , he was my husband. Rather than make vows right out of the gate, we lived them. For over ten years. The good times and the bad.

'Standing up there with our children at our sides - celebrating all that has been - was bliss.

'I love you Jeffrey. I love our intimate group of friends and family who joined us. I love the various circles of loved ones who have supported us over the years. It was private and magical and everything I dreamed. So yeah. I’m Mrs. Morgan.'

Glam: The happy couple posed together amid red carpet entrances for the new TWD season

She signed off with '10.5.19.'

He also said on Instagram: 'I’d say words... but there aren’t any. Mrs Morgan.... I love you. Thank you for making me the luckiest man in the world. Xojd.'

And then the actor noted: 'Ok. A few words... It was an intimate ceremony... performed by @jensenackles and @bigbaldhead with our kids at our sides... and the party of the century afterwards... thank you to all our friends and family. It was, without a doubt... the best day of our lives. Ever ever. Just never knew that it could be so damn perfect. It was. And more. Xxxxjd'

The two were last seen together in late September at the season 10 screening of the AMC series in Los Angeles.

The Seattle native, 53, and the Virginia-born beauty, 37, embraced and kissed during red carpet entrances at TCL Chinese 6 Theatres.

The actor, who plays Negan on the AMC hit, donned a black suit with a collared olive green shirt.

Iconic villain: Jeffrey has appeared as Negan since the show's seventh season

The One Tree Hill actress wore a silk spaghetti strap top with a textured skirt with pearl-adorned strappy sandal heels, with her lustrous brown locks parted to one side and hoop earrings.

Also in September she called Morgan her 'husband.' The star was thanking Greg Lauren for a jacket.

Morgan and Burton have been together since 2009 and wed in 2014.

He was previously wed to actress Anya Longwell from 1992 thru 2003.

The Walking Dead's new season debuts Sunday, October 6 at 9/8c on AMC.
